item.title: PLUG
item.description: score:-53 Chances: Plug Power showcases world’s first 15TPD green hydrogen plant. Positive response to Plug Power’s analyst day and hydrogen plant showcase. Analysts predicting tremendous growth and potential for soaring stock prices. Plug Power beats revenue estimates despite wider Q2 losses. Strong interest and investments in hydrogen technology, driving growth.
